title.en: Ha Long Carnaval Festival - Where vibrant music blends with vibrant colors
title.vi: Ha Long Carnaval Festival - Where vibrant music blends with vibrant colors

description.en:
Cultural festival welcomes the vibrant tourist season: Taking place at the end of April every year, Carnaval Ha Long attracts a large number of domestic and foreign tourists.
Ha Long Carnaval Festival, an annual event that attracts a large number of tourists from all over, not only domestically but also from abroad. This event is not only rich in culture but also an opportunity to welcome the vibrant and bustling tourist season in the coastal city of Quang Ninh.

children.text: Unique features of Carnaval Ha Long:
Cultural festival welcomes the vibrant tourist season: Taking place at the end of April every year, Carnaval Ha Long attracts a large number of domestic and foreign tourists.

Ha Long Carnaval Festival, an annual event that attracts a large number of tourists from all over, not only domestically but also from abroad. This event is not only rich in culture but also an opportunity to welcome the vibrant and bustling tourist season in the coastal city of Quang Ninh.

Unique theme each year: Each year, the festival has a unique theme, conveying a meaningful message to tourists and local people. Beautiful, lively images along with organized cultural events meticulously, welcoming a vibrant and bustling tourist season in the coastal city of Quang Ninh. It can be said that this is one of the most unique and impressive festivals in Quang Ninh that tourists from all over enjoy.

Unique combination: Carnaval Ha Long is a combination of music, street art, and costume parades, creating a vibrant and colorful party. The festival takes place in different locations such as beaches and roads, creating conditions for visitors to explore the natural beauty of Ha Long. Just immerse yourself in the joyful atmosphere of the festival, you will experience extremely comfortable moments. Especially when the festival is held on the beach with cool sea water, or parades along the roads, creating conditions for visitors to admire the beautiful natural scenery of Ha Long city.
Unique features of Carnaval Ha Long:

Beautiful, lively images along with organized cultural events meticulously, welcoming a vibrant and bustling tourist season in the coastal city of Quang Ninh. It can be said that this is one of the most unique and impressive festivals in Quang Ninh that tourists from all over enjoy.

Just immerse yourself in the joyful atmosphere of the festival, you will experience extremely comfortable moments. Especially when the festival is held on the beach with cool sea water, or parades along the roads, creating conditions for visitors to admire the beautiful natural scenery of Ha Long city.
Explore exciting activities

Carnaval Parade: Admire the colorful parades, with unique costumes and exciting music. For those who have had the opportunity to participate in Carnaval Ha Long, it will certainly no longer be unfamiliar with the crowded and bustling images of unique performances on the streets. Every year, the city's central streets will become "performance grounds" for unique musical performances. The dancers will wear impressive costumes and stir up the surrounding atmosphere with vibrant music. At this time, visitors can stand on both sides of the street to watch each parade, enjoy street food and participate in interesting Vietnamese folk games.
Explore exciting activities

Carnaval Parade: Admire the colorful parades, with unique costumes and exciting music. For those who have had the opportunity to participate in Carnaval Ha Long, it will certainly no longer be unfamiliar with the crowded and bustling images of unique performances on the streets. Every year, the city's central streets will become "performance grounds" for unique musical performances. The dancers will wear impressive costumes and stir up the surrounding atmosphere with vibrant music. At this time, visitors can stand on both sides of the street to watch each parade, enjoy street food and participate in interesting Vietnamese folk games.
Unique art program: Enjoy unique art performances, imbued with Vietnamese cultural identity.

Carnaval Ha Long, one of the busiest and most vibrant festivals, is always a destination not to be missed for those who love the pulse of Vietnamese music and culture. This festival is proud to present unique music shows, often taking place at the International Convention Center, with a main stage that can accommodate up to 1,500 spectators, and top-notch sound and lighting systems.

Each program at Carnaval Ha Long is a delicate combination of music and elaborate choreography, with the theme of praising the beauty of the homeland, the country and the people of Vietnam. These performances not only bring viewers back to their roots, but also evoke national pride and spread the country's image to international friends.

Music performances last all night with vibrant melodies, promising to bring unforgettable hours of entertainment. This is also an opportunity to interact with leading artists and singers, creating a warm and intimate atmosphere between art and the audience.

It seems that fireworks display is always the most anticipated performance by many tourists on every occasion of Carnaval Ha Long festival. Although the activity only lasts about 15 minutes and the artillery only fires at low altitude, these are always memorable and wonderful experiences that visitors look forward to the most.

Carnaval Ha Long once a year proves to be a cultural event worth looking forward to, gathering in large venues, enough to accommodate thousands of people, so that each visitor can experience the extreme excitement of this festival.

Street activities and culinary enjoyment:

Participate in exciting entertainment activities on the streets, immersing yourself in the bustling atmosphere of the festival. Enjoy delicious dishes from all over the country, giving you a diverse culinary experience.

Those who have attended Carnaval Ha Long certainly cannot forget the jubilant and bustling scene of colorful street performances. Every year, the city's main thoroughfares turn into majestic stages, where dancers in gorgeous costumes enliven the space with bustling music. Visitors can easily fully enjoy the festive atmosphere when standing on both sides of the road, admiring the parades, enjoying rich culinary flavors and participating in attractive Vietnamese folk games. .
Street activities and culinary enjoyment:

Participate in exciting entertainment activities on the streets, immersing yourself in the bustling atmosphere of the festival. Enjoy delicious dishes from all over the country, giving you a diverse culinary experience.

Those who have attended Carnaval Ha Long certainly cannot forget the jubilant and bustling scene of colorful street performances. Visitors can easily fully enjoy the festive atmosphere when standing on both sides of the road, admiring the parades, enjoying rich culinary flavors and participating in attractive Vietnamese folk games. .
Ha Long Carnaval Festival 2024: Bright with Wonders"
Time: Evening of April 28, 2024
Location: Ocean Park beach, Vo Nguyen Giap street, Bai Chay ward, Ha Long city

Let's welcome a special, unforgettable night in Ha Long city with the event "Light Up With Wonders". This is the first time Vietnam has organized a landscape art performance and Carnaval at sea, bringing together a unique light show with the most modern drone technology and the participation of leading artists and artisans. from all over the country and international delegations.

This event is not only a night of artistic reunion but also a spectacular light technology performance, promising to light up the sky and sea of ​​Ha Long, bringing audiences visual experiences. impressive and unforgettable. In particular, the Ha Long Carnaval Festival uses light projection technology using drones with 1,600 - 2,300 drones, combined with 3D mapping technology. The light show will depict typical symbols of Ha Long - Quang Ninh.

Come and enjoy a unique event where culture, art and technology converge, affirming Ha Long's position not only as a world natural heritage but also as a leading destination for events. international lawsuit.

Notes when participating in the festival:
Book early: The festival attracts a large number of visitors, so you need to book in advance to avoid running out of rooms.
Arrive early: The festival can get crowded, so arrive early to get the best viewing spot.
Be careful with goods: Choose carefully and ask the price before purchasing.

Ha Long Carnaval Festival is a great opportunity for you to explore unique culture, immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere and enjoy fun moments with family and friends. Come to Carnaval Ha Long, one of the festivals that tourists need to participate in in Vietnam
